item.title: Create/paste snippets from Terminal
item.author: Author
item.description: What’s snippet/gist? gist is a piece of code or maybe some important text shared on Github or Gitlab. It’s actually a git repository so you can clone it, work on it locally and push changes. Share gists from Terminal There are multiple programs available in many distributions for this purpose. You just have to find it. On Arch Linux, you can install gist. Here is how it works in terminal.
